definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
yes (used by Emperor or ruler)/OK/to accede/to assent
James Soong (1942-), Taiwanese politician expelled from Guomindang in 2000 when he founded People First Party 親民黨|亲民党
Zhou Yu or Chou Yü (175-210), famous general of the southern Wu kingdom and victor of the battle of Redcliff/in Romance of the Three Kingdoms, absolutely no match for Zhuge Liang
lit. a blemish does not obscure jade's luster/the pros outweigh the cons (idiom)
Daniel Han Kuo-yu (1957-), Taiwanese KMT politician, mayor of Kaohsiung since 2018
two remarkable persons living at the same period (as 周瑜[Zhou1 Yu2] and 諸葛亮|诸葛亮[Zhu1 ge3 Liang4])

fig. with the connivance of both sides/fig. by mutual consent/cf Wu patriot Huang Gai submits to mock beating at the hands of General Zhou Yu to deceive Cao Cao 曹操 before the 208 battle of Redcliff 赤壁之戰|赤壁之战[Chi4 bi4 zhi1 zhan4]
see 唯識宗|唯识宗[Wei2 shi2 zong1]
see 唯識宗|唯识宗[Wei2 shi2 zong1]

sentences.english: She has just completed her first year at the University of Pennsylvania.
sentences.chinese: 陆景瑜刚刚度过了在宾夕法尼亚大学的第一个学年。

sentences.english: The difference between an ordinary person and the yoginis how they view their emotions and react to them.
sentences.chinese: 凡人和瑜行者的差别在于他们如何看待情绪和反应。

sentences.english: It is said Yogo is of great benefit to human health.
sentences.chinese: 听说瑜咖功对人体安康有极年夜益处。

sentences.english: Zhou Yu accepted the gifts and sent Sun Qian back ahead of him.
sentences.chinese: 瑜收了礼物，发付孙干先回。

sentences.english: The fifth chapter actually is a reflection, and the conclusion as well.
sentences.chinese: 第五章是福泽瑜吉教育思想反思，亦是研究的结论。

sentences.english: The banners and pennons began to toll to and fro, and when Zhou Yu came out to look, the fringes of the flags were actually fluttering to the northwest.
sentences.chinese: 瑜出帐看时，旗脚竟飘西北。

sentences.english: It is said Yogo is beneficial to human health.
sentences.chinese: 听说瑜咖功对人体安康有极年夜益处。

definition: bright/luminous/white (esp. bright white teeth of youth or white hair of old age)
Minister of War (official title in pre-Han Chinese states)/two-character surname Sima
Zhou Yu or Chou Yü (175-210), famous general of the southern Wu kingdom and victor of the battle of Redcliff/in Romance of the Three Kingdoms, absolutely no match for Zhuge Liang
Cheng Yu (141-220), advisor to General Cao Cao 曹操 during the Three Kingdoms era
Lu Su or Lu Zijing 魯子敬|鲁子敬 (172-217), statesman, diplomat and strategist of Eastern Wu 東吳|东吴
